item.title: 服药须知及饮食营养
item.description: 服药须知 服药的时候大家务必规律饮食，服用期间，请忌口一切肉类蛋白质食物，多膳食纤维、新鲜橙汁。新冠肺炎喜欢寒湿，寒湿体质的人容易感染，所以白

item.title: 药品资质及制作流程
item.description: Herbal Supplement Qualifications All those free herbal supplements are nutrients extracted from natural plants using high-tech, regulating the human body’s internal environment, and improving its immune function. The pharmaceutical factory of supplements has obtained GMP certification, international ISP9001/2000 certification, ISO17025 TAF international laboratory certification, ILAC-MRA certification, IA certification, APLAC certification. item.dc:creator: 医行天下

item.description: About Us In over 10000 online sessions from 14 countries, Dr. Yang Xiaofeng and his global volunteer team have helped many people recover their health during this pandemic. In the global efforts against the Covid-19, all nationalities, races, ethnicities, class backgrounds, governments, and many private organizations are doing their part in the fight.
